personal development is a lifelong

number one is pretty simple it's drink
more water a glass of water may seem

water the secret is to keep the glass of
water full and you also have to use a

pretty large glass of water it's a
psychological trick called the

availability bias that makes your brain
think hey there's a bunch of water there

we should drink some water a downside of
this is that you have to go to the

bathroom quite a bit more but it really
makes a substantial difference on your

productivity and your energy levels
number two is to eat Whole Foods as a
